title: Lonsdale Says Tech Is Stepping up in Pandemic
itunes:title: Lonsdale Says Tech Is Stepping up in Pandemic
description:
Joe Lonsdale, Partner at 8VC, discusses how Silicon Valley is trying to rise to the challenge of the coronavirus outbreak. He explains why innovation is key to fighting the pandemic.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
